name: Dragon's Bane
r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.
r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 24%.
r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 28%.
r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 32%.
r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Pyro by 36%.
